welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lopatcong, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves as the central hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport offers a comfortable and convenient space for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Hangar
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, Doylestown Airport offers a private hangar for added privacy and luxury.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
